subject: Math
title: Let's Sort!
learningObjectives: Identify similarities and differences between objects.
Sort a collection of objects based on a single attribute (e.g., color, shape, size).
Describe the attribute used for sorting.

content.body: Sorting is putting things together that are alike. Let's be super sorters!

content.alt: A collection of colorful shapes being sorted into groups.

content.body: We can sort by color, shape, or size. How would you sort your toys?

questions.question: If you sort by color, which of these belong together?
You have a pile of socks. How can you sort them?

content.body: Clasificar es juntar cosas que son iguales. ¡Seamos súper clasificadores!

questions.question: Si clasificas por color, ¿cuáles de estos van juntos?
Tienes un montón de calcetines. ¿Cómo puedes clasificarlos?
